name: fc25-sbc-solver
description: FC25 SBC Solution Finder with enhanced multi-source data collection

scripts.preinstall: npm config set registry https://registry.npmjs.org/ && npm config set cache /tmp/.npm --location=global || true && npm config set prefer-online true && npm config set fetch-retries 5 && npm config set fetch-retry-factor 2 && npm config set fetch-retry-maxtimeout 60000 && npm cache clean --force || true
